value:
Is this a dream? I see nothing but
darkness all around me...

If not for the war, I could have lived a
quiet life...with Michalis and Minerva...

It's all right... Once I accept Lord
Medeus's control, everything will...
be better...

I don't want to see Michalis and
Minerva fight again... This world...
So awful...

Macedon? I'm sorry, I...don't know
what that is...

Where am I? What is this place? It's
not $Nf's castle...

Michalis... Minerva... Please don't
leave me here alone...
Lord Medeus will rule the world...
Stay back... You frighten me.
Do I use this...to take more lives?

I am...Maria. I offer up my life...for the
world Lord Medeus will create.

Michalis! Minerva! Are you here to...
save me? Wait, no... You're not my...
You're $Nu.$k$pWhere am I?$k$pI'm tired of being afraid... I'm tired
of being sad all the time...$k$pIf this is what the world is like...then
the world is bad. It should end.
Lord Medeus can make it end.$k$pOr maybe you can end it for me?
Please...it's the only way to stop
the endless conflict...
Michalis...
Minerva...
Do not defy him.
Slaughter.
It wasn't a dream…
Rise.
Move.
Slay all who defy Lord Medeus.
Minerva, is that you? Michalis, are you there?
Who… Who am I?
My family… I want to be together... Always…
Will you be my friend? Will you stay with me? And never leave?
Mm-hmm…
Which way?
No...
